metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43592 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the DPXOutput::close() functionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.4.4.2. A specially crafted ImageOutput Object can lead to leaked heap data. An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
